title.rendered: INTECH lands multiyear contract to provide high integrity pressure protection system (HIPPS) for protecting infield oil gathering infrastructure at a major Middle Eastern oilfield

content.rendered:
[vc_row][vc_column][vc_column_text]INTECH has been awarded a contract to provide high integrity pressure protects system (HIPPS) for protecting infield oil gathering infrastructure at a major oil field in the Middle East.

INTECH’s project history spans over two decades in the region and won this project based on successful project completions at the same field, earning immense praise for project management, timely delivery, and the quality of systems & service. The viability of INTECH’s solution and excellent business history with the client also proved instrumental in winning the project.

The client on this project, one of the largest regional oil companies, sought INTECH’s expertise for manufacturing and installing IOPPS packages downstream of the manifolds for protecting trunklines and degassing stations from potential overpressure. INTECH is offering Zone-2 suitable solar powered HIPPS skids with 16” and 2” shut down valves, SIL-3 logic solver cabinet and remote telemetry controls.

INTECH’s scope includes the following:

  • Design, engineering, supply and testing of HIPPS skids
  • Factory Acceptance Test
  • Site Services
  • Equipment training for operators
  • Commissioning & Startup and O&M spares

How we are responding to COVID 19: We are ensuring that our services and business agreements are executed to the satisfaction of our clients and partners without exposing anyone to COVID 19. Our factories are operational with significant new safety measures. We have devised a global COVID 19 plan that covers international movement, precautions, behavioral changes, and contingency & emergency response options for all our business regions.

If you are an INTECH client and have not received information about our business continuity plans, please feel free to reach out to an INTECH account manager or project manager.

About INTECH’s Integrated Control Systems (ICS) Solutions

INTECH’s Integrated Control Systems offer a complete array of vendor-neutral control automation and integration solutions ranging from basic Process Control, Safety, F&G, and Power Management applications to data networks, site security, instrument management, and fully integrated control and safety systems. Our third-party start-up and commissioning services ensure minimum downtime and accelerated glitch-free execution. INTECH’s ICS is a “One-Stop Automation Solution” that improves plant safety, reliability, and efficiency while lowering costs and increasing returns.

For more information visit: https://www.intechww.com/automation/integrated-control-systems/

About INTECH

INTECH Process Automation is a globally renowned system integrator and industrial automation company. For nearly 30 years we have helped major oil & gas companies solve their most pressing issues of instrumentation, control, and electrical automation. INTECH’s diversiﬁed automation solution portfolio, technical skills, knowledge, and expertise on equipment from all major OEMs, and our asset-application speciﬁc approach to solution design are what differentiates us from a typical system integrator.

As the world moves towards Industry 4.0, we move along with it and since late 2016, we have focused on building up our expertise on Industrial IoT and related digitalization solutions. We are gradually shifting from a project-based solution provider to a partnership-based solution provider. We have started working closely with our technology and platform partners as well as clients to build long-term relationships where we work together to solve problems and provide solutions that are cost-efficient, time-efficient, and bring the best of what everyone can offer.

For more information, please visit: www.intechww.com[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row]
